name: Cleanup Status
Turn on light and try again
Turn off if it was initially off
Only run if it's not running already
Calculate Fan Speed
At end of day and non-business hours, turn off everything once motion stops for 30 minutes
At beginning of day, turn on fan or light if needed
During the work day, monitor temperature and lux and turn on/off fan or light as needed
During non-work hours, do normal motion lights
When I have a meeting notify through Google Home and pause the TV
